focus.title: Focus
focus.description:
• Maximum of five bullet points covering your core areas of experience, professional expertise, or technologies
  • As a graduate without professional experience: enter relevant focus areas and skills from your studies, internships, or other student activities and update after the first weeks, during a project change, but at latest six months after joining Senacor
  • As an experienced professional:
    • First bullet point: A summarizing sentence of your experience
    • Last bullet point: Industry focus
focus.placeholder: List focus areas, one per line

experience.title: Education and Professional Experience
experience.description:
• First bullet point: current position at Senacor including start year
  • Additional bullet points in reverse chronological order:
    • Previous employments with employment period and naming of former employers (Example: Systems Engineer, ExampleTech AG (2015-2017))
    • Professional/university/college degrees with graduation year and mention of academic institution (Example: M.Sc. in Business Informatics, University of Ulm (2020))
    • Optional: professional certifications/publications/patents/etc. (Example: Certified SCRUM Master (2017))
  • If not all employments/degrees fit in the field, the slide can be used for additions.
experience.placeholder: List experiences or certificates, one per line

projects.title: Project History
projects.description:
• List projects in descending priority regarding the core experience areas mentioned in the focus section
  • As a graduate without project experience: experiences from study-related activities, thesis, internships, or similar
  • As an experienced professional: most relevant projects
  • With additional line management experience: mention line position if it contributes to the profile. Explicitly mention the line activities and scope of responsibility if applicable.
